metadata.title: CVE-2019-18976 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in res_pjsip_t38.c in Sangoma Asterisk through 13.xand Certified Asterisk through 13.21-x. If it receives a re-inviteinitiating T.38 faxing and has a port of 0 and no c line in the SDP, a NULLpointer dereference and crash will occur. This is different fromCVE-2019-18940.

criterions.comment: asterisk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
